import React from "react" import { Table, Card, CardHeader, CardBody, CardTitle, TabContent, TabPane, Nav, NavItem, NavLink } from "reactstrap" import classnames from "classnames" import { Eye, Code } from "react-feather" import { tableInverse } from "./TableSourceCode" class TableInverse extends React.Component { state = { activeTab: "1" } toggleTab = tab => { if (this.state.activeTab !== tab) { this.setState({ activeTab: tab }) } } render() { return ( Inverse
{ this.toggleTab("1") }} > { this.toggleTab("2") }} >
